last_episode_to_air.name: Day 6 - Charge Sheet
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kurian, Manoj and their team have been chasing Shiju all over. But how long can a man hide away if he is genuinely in love?

name: Kerala Crime Files: Shiju, Parayil Veedu, Neendakara
original_name: കേരളാ  ക്രൈം ഫയല്സ്: ഷിജു, പാറയിൽ വീട്, നീണ്ടകര
overview: A sex worker's mysterious and gruesome murder in a suburban lodge called "Grand Tourist Home" baffles the police as the only lead they have is a fake address.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A team of five policemen led by Sub-Inspector Manoj is on a chase to solve a murder in a suburban lodge room, with just one clue - a fake address, Shiju, Parayil Veedu, Neendakara, from a lodge register.

episodes.name: Day 1 - Crime Scene
episodes.overview: A sex worker, Swapna, is found dead in a run down lodge in Kochi. Circle Inspector Kurian and Sub-Inspector Manoj  from the North police station begin their investigation.

episodes.name: Day 2 - Mahazar
episodes.overview: The investigation crew learns that only the receptionist, Sharath, has seen the culprit. With Sharath's help, Manoj tries to get Shiju's sketch made."

episodes.name: Day 3 - Detection
episodes.overview: Swapna's roommate, Lathika, reveals to Manoj about meeting Shiju. The SI connects the dots after she tells him about Shiju's cruelty.

episodes.name: Day 4 - Findings
episodes.overview: The police expand their search to the other lodges in Kochi after Manoj and his team figure out that Shiju has a practice of meeting sex workers in such places.

episodes.name: Day 5 - Evidence
episodes.overview: The investigative team learns about Star Shiju, a name derived from the hotel he worked at. They set out to explore Shiju's roots

episodes.name: Day 6 - Charge Sheet
episodes.overview: Kurian, Manoj and their team have been chasing Shiju all over. But how long can a man hide away if he is genuinely in love?

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A team of five policemen led by Sub-Inspector Manoj is on a chase to solve a murder in a suburban lodge room, with just one clue - a fake address, Shiju, Parayil Veedu, Neendakara, from a lodge register.
